import { useState } from 'react' import propTypes from 'prop-types' import Link from 'next/link' import { Menu, Input, Row, Col } from 'antd' const { Search } = Input function AppLayout({ children }) { const [isLoggedIn, setIsLoggedIn] = useState(false) return (
Home Profile Sign Up {isLoggedIn ? : } {children} Made by Hyoje common {children}
) } // @@ desc - to check props, children is a type of node that is inside return AppLayout.propTypes = { children: propTypes.node.isRequired, } export default AppLayout
